title: GDD book
text:
Preface
Let’s write our first online book using Quarto

title: 1  Introduction to the Group Development Day
text:
1.1 Morning
We are going to find out how to use Quarto to create online course materials in the form of books that you can edit whenever you like.
In the morning we will cover all the steps needed to publish a book

title: 2  Summary
text:
In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
